title: kai viDAmal
sahitya:
kai viDAmal aDiyArai uyya krpai sheivOn vaiyApuriyil uraiyum vaDivEl murugayyan


anupallavi

  vaiyaga vAzhvidanil varuttam aDutta pOdum mei shOrndu manam mayangiDum pOdum


caraNam    tannai nADi vandiDum anbar nondu paDum tunbat-tuyaram ODa tuNai tandiDuvadODu
inba sukhattoD-avar enrum irundu varavE kunrAdu kUDuginra karuNaikk-Idu aTrOn
